gov.ca.water.calgui.tech_service

Interface IErrorHandlingSvc

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorHandlingSvcImpl

    public interface IErrorHandlingSvc
    This is the interface for handling different type of error like validatione, business, system and also used for displaying the error messages.
    Author:
    Mohan

    • Method Detail

      • validationeErrorHandler

        void validationeErrorHandler(java.lang.String displayMessage,
                             java.lang.String detailMessage,
                             javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame)
        This method is used to display the Validation related Errors. For example when user forget to enter the value in a field then we use this method to display the error.
        Parameters:
        displayMessage - Message message to display to the user.
        detailMessage - Detail message with stack trace for additional information.
        mainFrame - For displaying the message.

      • validationeErrorHandler

        void validationeErrorHandler(javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame,
                             java.lang.Throwable aThrowable)
        This method is used to display the Validation related Errors. For example when user forget to enter the value in a field then we use this method to display the error.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - For displaying the message.
        aThrowable - An exception class which has all messages in layer and the stack trace.

      • businessErrorHandler

        void businessErrorHandler(java.lang.String displayMessage,
                          java.lang.String detailMessage,
                          javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame)
        This method is used to display the Business related Errors. For example when we are doing some computation and if we get an error then we should use this method to display the error when the file is missing then we can use to tell the user.
        Parameters:
        displayMessage - Message message to display to the user.
        detailMessage - Detail message with stack trace for additional information.
        mainFrame - For displaying the message.

      • systemErrorHandler

        void systemErrorHandler(java.lang.String displayMessage,
                        java.lang.String detailMessage,
                        javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame)
        We should display this error when the error which is not been able to fix by the user. This method will close the Application.
        Parameters:
        displayMessage - message to display to the user.
        detailMessage - Detail message with stack trace for additional information.
        mainFrame - For displaying the message.

      • systemErrorHandler

        Parameters:

      • getStackTraceAsString

        java.lang.String getStackTraceAsString(java.lang.Throwable aThrowable)
        This method will take the Throwable and convert the the Stack Trace into a string and return it.
        Parameters:
        aThrowable - An exception class which has all messages in layer and the stack trace.
        Returns:
        Will return whole stack trace as string.
